extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Opening Untrusted X_T Files
extracted_playbook.description: Do not open untrusted X_T files in affected applications to reduce risk.

extracted_playbook.condition: Which product version is in use?

extracted_playbook.title: Update Teamcenter Visualization V14.2
extracted_playbook.description: Update Teamcenter Visualization V14.2 to V14.2.0.12 or later version.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Teamcenter Visualization V14.3
extracted_playbook.description: Update Teamcenter Visualization V14.3 to V14.3.0.10 or later version.

extracted_playbook.title: Update JT2Go
extracted_playbook.description: Update JT2Go to V2312.0005 or later version.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Teamcenter Visualization V2312
extracted_playbook.description: Update Teamcenter Visualization V2312 to V2312.0005 or later version.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Protect network access to devices with appropriate mechanisms and configure the environment according to Siemens' operational guidelines for industrial security.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and/or systems, ensuring they are not accessible from the internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Firewalls and Isolate Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use more secure methods, such as Virtual Private Networks (VPNs). Ensure VPNs are updated to the most recent version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets, following CISA's guidance.
